text: She was just told this morning that she's being furloughed

So we're both really happy, she's much less worried now.

That sounds really interesting! I'll look into them both. I love a good sci-fi so a truly different perspective is a compelling pitch.

That's great! I'll definitely see what I can do about that. I've been looking at some of Neil Gaiman's books recently so I appreciate the recommendation there.
